results.description: Elise Christie is set to miss four World Cup races due to "ill health" and says she feels like a "complete failure".
results.title: Elise Christie: Speed skater out until January due to 'ill health'

results.description: British speed skater Elise Christie reveals she suffered depression and anxiety for two years.
results.shortTitle: Christie had depression for two years
results.title: Elise Christie: British skater reveals battle with depression and anxiety

results.description: Britain's Elise Christie wins silver in the 500m at the final speed skating World Cup of the season in Italy.
results.shortTitle: GB's Christie wins 500m silver in Italy
results.title: Speed Skating World Cup: Elise Christie wins 500m silver in Turin

results.description: Great Britain win mixed relay bronze at the Dresden Short Track World Cup as Elise Christie misses out on individual medal.
results.shortTitle: GB win World Cup mixed relay bronze
results.title: Short Track World Cup: Great Britain win mixed relay bronze in Germany

results.description: A South Korean athlete who says she was physically and sexually abused by her coach tells her story.
results.title: South Korea sex abuse scandal: 'My skating coach kissed and touched me'

results.description: Elise Christie returns to speed skating as the British mixed relay team fail to qualify from their 2,000m heats in Canada.
results.shortTitle: GB make early exit on Christie return
results.title: Elise Christie returns as British mixed relay team fail to qualify from heats

results.description: Funding for the Beijing 2022 Olympic and Paralympic cycle is a "good news story" for winter sports despite £8m cuts, says UK Sport.
results.title: UK Sport chief Liz Nicholl says Beijing 2022 winter sport funding a 'good news story'

results.description: Scottish short track speed skater Elise Christie admits she is still coming to terms with her Winter Olympics heartbreak.
results.shortTitle: 'I wouldn't say I'm over it' - Christie
results.title: Elise Christie: Scottish speed skater 'not over' Winter Olympics heartbreak

label: Pyeongchang 2018 Medal Event: Speed Skating - Women's 1000 m
Speed Skating - Women's 1000 m

results.description: Ice skaters take a twirl on the frozen canals of the Netherlands.
results.shortTitle: Ice skating fun on Dutch canals
results.title: Ice skating fun breaks out on Dutch canals

results.description: South Korea's Lee Seung-hoon win's gold for the home nation, and his second medal in Pyeongchang, in the first men's speed skating mass start event at the Winter Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Lee Seung-Hoon wins gold in men's mass start
results.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Korea's Lee Seung-Hoon wins gold in men's mass start

results.description: South Korea's Lee Seung-hoon wins gold for the home nation in the first men's speed skating mass start event at the Winter Olympics.
results.shortTitle: South Korea take mass-start skating gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Lee Seung-hoon wins gold in mass start in Pyeongchang

label: Pyeongchang 2018 Medal Event: Speed Skating - Men’s Mass Start
Speed Skating - Men’s Mass Start

results.description: Japan's Nana Takagi wins her second gold in Pyeongchang after holding off a late sprint from home favourite Kim Bo-Reum in the first ever ladies' mass start final at the Winter Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Takagi wins women's mass start gold
results.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Japan's Nana Takagi wins ladies mass start speed skating gold

results.description: Japan's Nana Takagi wins gold in the first women's speed skating mass start event at the Winter Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Takagi wins gold in women's mass start
results.title: Winter Olympics: Japan's Nana Takagi wins gold in women's mass start

label: Pyeongchang 2018 Medal Event: Speed Skating - Women’s Mass Start
Speed Skating - Women’s Mass Start

results.description: The Netherlands' Kjeld Nuis wins a second speed skating gold medal at the Winter Olympics with victory in the 1,000m final in Pyeongyang.
results.shortTitle: Nuis wins second speed skating gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Kjeld Nuis wins speed skating 1,000m to add to 1500m gold

results.description: Kjeld Nuis of the Netherlands becomes the men's 1,000m speed skating Olympic champion in Pyeongchang.
results.shortTitle: Nuis wins men's 1,000m speed skating gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Kjeld Nuis takes men's 1,000m speed skating gold

results.description: Norway beat hosts South Korea in the final to win team pursuit speed skating gold at the 2018 Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang.
results.shortTitle: Norway win men's team pursuit gold
results.title: Winter Olympic 2018: Norway win men's team pursuit gold

results.description: Japan set a new Olympic record to beat the Netherlands to women's speed skating team pursuit gold as Norway won the men's event.
results.shortTitle: Japan win women's team pursuit gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Japan win women's speed skating team pursuit; Norway claim men's gold

label: Pyeongchang 2018 Medal Event: Speed Skating - Women's Team Pursuit
Speed Skating - Women's Team Pursuit

thumbnail.altText: Japan's women's speed skating team celebrate

results.description: Japan shock favourites the Netherlands in the women's speed skating team pursuit, winning gold in an Olympic record time of two minutes 53.89 seconds.
results.shortTitle: Japan shock Dutch for women's team pursuit gold
results.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Japan shock Netherlands to take gold in women's speed skating team pursuit

results.description: More than 350,000 people sign a petition calling for two South Korean speed skaters to be banned for "bullying" a team-mate.
results.title: Winter Olympics: Petition calls for ban for South Korean speed skater 'bullies'
